Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.persistence

Interface Storer

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileStorer, StorerWrapper
public interface Storer
extends Service
The Storer interface defines a persistent storage service for actors and actor-based applications.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void delete​(String i)
    Removes an actor from the persistent storage.
    String getId()
    Gets the persistent storage identifier.
    Set<String> list()
    Lists the addresses (names) of the actors in the persistent storage.
    Actor load​(String i)
    Loads an actor from the persistent storage.
    void remove​(String i)
    Removes an actor space from the persistent storage.
    Configuration retrieve​(String i)
    Retrieves a checkpoint of an actor space from the persistent storage.
    boolean save​(Configuration c, String i)
    Creates a checkpoint of an actor space and stores it in the persistent storage.
    void shutdown()
    Shutdowns the persistent storage manager.
    int size()
    Gets the number of the actors in the persistent storage.
    void start()
    Starts the persistent storage manager.
    boolean store​(Actor a, String i)
    Stores an actor in the persistent storage.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Starts the persistent storage manager.

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shutdowns the persistent storage manager.

    • save

      boolean save​(Configuration c, String i)
      Creates a checkpoint of an actor space and stores it in the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      c - the configuration object defining the actor space checkpoint.
      i - the actor space persistent storage identifier.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successful.

    • retrieve

      Configuration retrieve​(String i)
      Retrieves a checkpoint of an actor space from the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      i - the actor space persistent storage identifier.
      Returns:
      the configuration object defining the actor space checkpoint. Note that the return value is null if the operation failed.

    • remove

      void remove​(String i)
      Removes an actor space from the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      i - the actor space persistent storage identifier.

    • load

      Actor load​(String i)
      Loads an actor from the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      i - the actor persistent storage identifier.
      Returns:
      the actor. Note that the return value is null if the operation failed.

    • store

      boolean store​(Actor a, String i)
      Stores an actor in the persistent storage. If the persistent storage does not exist, then it creates it.
      Parameters:
      a - the actor.
      i - the actor persistent storage identifier.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is successful.

    • delete

      void delete​(String i)
      Removes an actor from the persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      i - the actor persistent storage identifier.

    • getId

      String getId()
      Gets the persistent storage identifier.
      Returns:
      the persistent storage identifier. Note that the return value is null if the persistent storage does not exist.

    • list

      Set<String> list()
      Lists the addresses (names) of the actors in the persistent storage.
      Returns:
      the list.

    • size

      int size()
      Gets the number of the actors in the persistent storage.
      Returns:
      the number.
